SEARCH
Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.selectionparameter

Class SelectionParameter<S extends org.uma.jmetal.solution.Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<String>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.CategoricalParameter
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.selectionparameter.SelectionParameter<S>
Type Parameters:
S - The type of solutions being evolved
public class SelectionParameter<S extends org.uma.jmetal.solution.Solution<?>> extends CategoricalParameter
A categorical parameter representing different selection strategies for evolutionary algorithms. This parameter allows selecting and configuring how parent solutions are chosen for reproduction.

The available selection strategies are:

  • tournament: Selects solutions based on tournament selection
  • random: Selects solutions uniformly at random
  • populationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection: Selects solutions based on both population-wide and neighborhood-based criteria

Required sub-parameters depend on the selection strategy:

  • For "tournament":
    • selectionTournamentSize: The size of the tournament (Integer)
  • For "populationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection":
    • neighborhoodSelectionProbability: Probability of selecting from neighborhood (Double)
    • neighborhood: A Neighborhood instance (provided via non-configurable parameters)
    • subProblemIdGenerator: A SequenceGenerator for subproblem IDs (provided via non-configurable parameters)

  • Constructor Details

    • SelectionParameter

      public SelectionParameter(List<String> selectionStrategies)
      Creates a new SelectionParameter with the specified selection strategies.
      Parameters:
      selectionStrategies - A list of valid selection strategy names. Supported values: - "tournament" - "random" - "populationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if selectionStrategies is null or empty

    • SelectionParameter

      public SelectionParameter(String name, List<String> selectionStrategies)
      Creates a new SelectionParameter with the specified name and selection strategies.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter
      selectionStrategies - A list of valid selection strategy names. Supported values: - "tournament" - "random" - "populationAndNeighborhoodMatingPoolSelection"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if selectionStrategies is null or empty

  • Method Details

    • getSelection

      public org.uma.jmetal.component.catalogue.ea.selection.Selection<S> getSelection(int matingPoolSize, Comparator<S> comparator)
      Creates and returns a Selection operator based on the current parameter value. The specific implementation and required parameters depend on the selection strategy.
      Parameters:
      matingPoolSize - The number of solutions to select
      comparator - The comparator used to compare solutions (used by some selection strategies)
      Returns:
      A configured Selection operator
      Throws:
      org.uma.jmetal.util.errorchecking.JMetalException - if the current value does not match any known selection strategy, or if required sub-parameters are missing or invalid
      IllegalArgumentException - if matingPoolSize is not positive or comparator is null

    • name

      public String name()
      Returns the name of this parameter.
      Overrides:
      name in class Parameter<String>
      Returns:
      The name of this parameter as specified in the constructor
